original_title: Im fliegenden Sarg - Die Landshut-Entf√ºhrung aus Sicht der Geiseln
overview: This documentary deals with the abduction of the "Landshut" in October 1977. Based on original recordings of  reporting from Mogadishu at the time, as well as and interviews with the hostages from 1980, the events are portrayed to give a unique, personal perspective to the hijacking.
tagline: Based on original interviews and recordings, this documentary deals with the abduction of the "Landshut" in October 1977.
title: In the flying coffin - The Landshut abduction from the hostages' point of view
